flexi:script.description: Executes a script that is provided sfdx context
examples: $ sfdx flexi:script --path <script file path> --hookcontext <hook context json>
$ sfdx flexi:script --path <script file path> --hookcontextpath <hook context json path>

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

path.name: path
path.description: The path of the script to execute

hookcontext.name: hookcontext
hookcontext.description: The hook context - typically passed from the hook script or can be provided for testing

hookcontextpath.name: hookcontextpath
hookcontextpath.description: The path to hook context - this is typically used for testing
